医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
西南研究院新临床供应设施破土动工西南研究院今天破土动工建设一座占地 21,000 平方英尺的新临床供应设施，以支持政府和行业客户进行综合制药和生物工程研究与开发。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/Southwest-Research-Institute-breaks-ground-on-new-clinical-supply-facility.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/Southwest-Research-Institute-breaks-ground-on-new-clinical-supply-facility.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=37440dd2-2e46-440b-89cf-bf3675641c0a Wed, 23 Oct 2024 21:20:21 -0400 Southwest Research Institute breaks ground on new clinical supply facility
免疫疗法可能是心力衰竭的有效治疗策略圣路易斯华盛顿大学医学院的一项新研究表明，一种免疫疗法：与美国食品和药物管理局 (FDA) 批准用于治疗关节炎等炎症性疾病的药物类似 -；也可能是心力衰竭的有效治疗策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/Immunotherapy-may-be-an- effective-treatment-strategy-for-heart-failure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/Immunotherapy-may-be-an- effective-treatment-strategy-for-heart-failure.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e797583c-dcd0-479c-9b8f-4485ec8c8626 Wed, 23 Oct 2024 21:10:38 -0400 Immunotherapy may be an effective treatment strategy for heart failure
新的化学语言模型可以预测双靶点候选药物波恩大学的研究人员训练了一个人工智能过程来预测具有特殊性质的潜在活性成分。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/New-chemical-language-model-can-predict-dual-target-drug-candidates.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/New-chemical-language-model-can-predict-dual-target-drug-candidates.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bf8a980b-87b4-4ccc-87df-a2279d923e53 Wed, 23 Oct 2024 21:05:58 -0400 New chemical language model can predict dual-target drug candidates
美国国立卫生研究院启动精准医学试验，测试骨髓癌的新疗法美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 启动了一项概念验证精准医学临床试验，以测试针对急性髓系白血病 (AML) 和骨髓增生异常综合征 (MDS) 患者癌细胞中特定基因变化的新治疗组合。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/NIH-launches- precision-medicine-trial-to-test-new-treatments-for-myeloid-cancers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/NIH-launches- precision-medicine-trial-to-test-new-treatments-for-myeloid-cancers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8dbb25ec-ba34-41d9-88aa-ec2adfb21001 Wed, 23 Oct 2024 20:56:20 -0400 NIH launches precision medicine trial to test new treatments for myeloid cancers
研究人员发现卵巢肿瘤如何削弱免疫细胞威尔康奈尔医学研究人员发现了卵巢肿瘤用来削弱免疫细胞并阻止其攻击的机制——阻断 T 细胞所依赖的能量供应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/Researchers-discover-how-ovarian-tumors-cripple-immune-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/Researchers-discover-how-ovarian-tumors-cripple-immune-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c352687a-bf72-4124-b820-a5566b7c27fb Wed, 23 Oct 2024 20:53:02 -0400 Researchers discover how ovarian tumors cripple immune cells
加沙敌对行动加剧，世卫组织在提供援助方面面临挑战10 月 21 日，在世卫组织领导的一次高风险联合行动中，在激烈的敌对行动和出入限制的情况下，14 名患者和 10 名护理人员从加沙北部的卡迈勒阿德万转移到加沙市的 Al-Shifa 医院。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/WHO-faces-challenges-in-delivering-aid-amid-intensifying-hostilities-in-Gaza.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/WHO-faces-challenges-in-delivering-aid-amid-intensifying-hostilities-in-Gaza.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e02fd303-f403-4f27-bee0-1807cd6ff3f0 Wed, 23 Oct 2024 20:47:42 -0400 WHO faces challenges in delivering aid amid intensifying hostilities in Gaza
多基因 RNA 特征增强了三阴性乳腺癌的治疗策略英国医学杂志今天发表的一项临床试验发现，使用基因特征技术为早期三阴性乳腺癌患者量身定制化疗方案有望成为提高无病生存率的一种方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/Multigene-RNA-signature-enhances-treatment-strategies-for-triple-阴性-breast-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/Multigene-RNA-signature-enhances-treatment-strategies-for-triple-阴性-breast-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=32450b66-427c-4b46-a713-46a05e4544f7 Wed, 23 Oct 2024 20:45:24 -0400 Multigene RNA signature enhances treatment strategies for triple negative breast cancer
母体抗体可能会阻碍婴儿疟疾疫苗的有效性巴塞罗那全球健康研究所 (ISGlobal) 与七个非洲国家合作开展的一项研究表明，穿过胎盘的母体抗体会干扰疟疾疫苗的反应，这可以解释其对五个月以下婴儿的功效较低的原因。中心（CISM-莫桑比克、IHI-坦桑尼亚、CRUN-布基纳法索、KHRC-加纳、NNIMR-加纳、CERMEL-加蓬、KEMRI-肯尼亚）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/Maternal-antibodies-may-hinder-malaria-vaccine-effectness-in-infants.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/Maternal-antibodies-may-hinder-malaria-vaccine- effectiveness-in-infants.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7051eeab-cc59-4c94-a455-e6efb6fe4960 Wed, 23 Oct 2024 20:41:55 -0400 Maternal antibodies may hinder malaria vaccine effectiveness in infants
加州一名官员帮助挽救了一家心理健康公司的合同。他乘飞机飞往伦敦。今年夏天，加利福尼亚州心理健康委员会主任受一家国有供应商的邀请前往伦敦，当时他正在帮助阻止 3.6 亿美元的预算削减，否则该公司的合同资金将被取消。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/A-California-official-helped-save-a-mental-health-companye28099s-contract-It-flew-him-to-London.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/A-California-official-helped-save-a-mental-health-companye28099s-contract-It-flew-him-to-London.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dc9282d8-9e8a-404d-a2d2-27dafa9f9251 Wed, 23 Oct 2024 20:30:00 -0400 A California official helped save a mental health company’s contract. It flew him to London.
吸食大麻与青少年大脑皮层变薄有关根据圣贾斯汀大学研究人员和蒙特利尔大学医学院教授 Graciela Pineyro 和 Tomas Paus 最近领导的一项研究，吸食大麻可能会导致青少年大脑皮层变薄。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/Cannabis-use-linked-to-thinning-cerebral-cortex-in-adolescents.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/Cannabis-use-linked-to-thinning-cerebral-cortex-in-adolescents.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3d501469-042d-4663-b039-b64ec56a72d3 Wed, 23 Oct 2024 13:29:12 -0400 Cannabis use linked to thinning cerebral cortex in adolescents
